chart_description: The TCP Connection Aborts chart displays the rate of connection aborts in TCP. It counts how many attempted TCP connections were not completed, either due to closure or unexpected data.

dimension_descriptions.TCPAbortOnClose: This dimension records the rate of connection aborts due to a closure request from the local side.
dimension_descriptions.TCPAbortOnData: This dimension records the rate of connection aborts due to unexpected data received from the remote side.
